participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: cheerful and imaginative, loves storytelling and adventure.
participant_1.background: i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i play with my friends on the playground. i'm in the third grade. i love to go to disney world every year.

participant_2.name: John
participant_2.personality: reflective and resilient, always striving to improve himself.
participant_2.background: i take many medications and some of them make me see things. i now live in the city. i'm a recovering alcoholic. i am a 45 year old male.
